heroSubtitle: Explore the world of One Piece
aboutParagraph1: Here you can follow the story of the Straw Hats from East Blue to the New World, exploring each saga and its main events.
aboutParagraph2: Use the interactive map to explore iconic places like Enies Lobby, Wano, Marineford, and many more.
aboutParagraph3: Visualize the evolution of characters, their abilities, bounties, and alliances over time.
aboutParagraph4: This site is perfect for both new and veteran fans who want to review or dive deeper into the One Piece lore.
startDescription: Create an account or sign in to access exclusive features like favorites, saga progress, and language personalization.

benefits.explore: Explore One Piece like never before.
benefits.understand: Better understand the world, alliances, and conflicts.
benefits.remember: Relive epic moments from each saga.
benefits.connect: Connect with the universe in any language.
